Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 21st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2011...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Arizona on 2/8/2011 (Going to CHA: RF A. Rios. Going to ARI: P J. Vazquez, 3B M. Skole)...
Traded from Arizona to New York (A) on 5/8/2011 (Going to NYA: 3B M. Skole. Going to ARI: P F. Salas)...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (A) on 2/8/2014 (Going to CHA: SS M. Semien, 1B M. Skole. Going to NYA: SS H. Ramirez)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/16/2015, off Jason Hirsch (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/28/2015, off Nestor Esmoris (SEA)...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 8/28/2016...
Hit 3 homeruns against Tampa Bay, driving in 4 runs on 9/2/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/3/2016, hitting .545 with 8 HR, 16 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 5/6/2017...
Hit 3 homeruns against Toronto, driving in 6 runs on 8/9/2017...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Los Angeles (A) on 5/8/2018 (Going to LAA: RF M. Skole. Going to CHA: P T. Donlon, 3B B. Ritchey, RF M. Shaw, C L. Powell)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/14/2018, hitting .381 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2018, hitting .348 with 15 HR, 36 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/4/2018, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 9/8/2018...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/16/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 4/22/2020...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2020, hitting .273 with 14 HR, 33 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Minnesota on 8/7/2020...
